content.rendered:
3D EVOLUTION FRONT BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA LANDCRUISER 16+ IS AVAILABLE NOW

Be some of the first to get your hands on our 200 series Landcruiser Rhino4x4 Evolution bar. If you want to guarantee to be one of the first to receive one of these you can order now. Just call us on 1300 885 841 to place your order.

-The Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing flat black Powder coat as standard with colour coding an option. It is a 3 and 6mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black or can be optioned in stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED foglights and recovery points which are an option on many other brands.

-The Landcruiser 3D Evolution bumper is compatible with front parking sensors and head lamp washers. Just let us know your if you have these at time of order to ensure you get the correct bar. We can provide blanketing plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors or washers. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

Includes:

Swing Away Number plate bracket

Hi-Lift Jacking Points

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated LED Foglights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

 

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

Shackles

excerpt.rendered: Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
